name: YouTube Video Page Redux
description:
Cleans the page with video on YouTube.com

* Favorite / Share / Report moved to the right
* Max-height + scrollbars on vid description + comments (you can read & watch at the same time!)
* Moves video add date under channel's name (to overlay channel's creation date)
* Shrinks embed URL and video URL to take less space
* Widens search under tabs
* Widens comments and comments' text fields
